site.description: Douglas Fuelber - Bachelor in Computer Science at Unisc and full stack developer at Conectt.
site.userDescription: As a programmer, I like to learn new technologies and languages, trying not to limit myself in just improving the knowledge I have already acquired. Also, I really like movies, series, to practice sports and getting to know new places.
